channel.title: CVE Feed for mihdan -- Index Now
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mihdan -- Index Now

item.title: CVE-2024-0428|2024-08-01T18:04:49.626Z -- mihdan -- index%20now
item.description: The Index Now plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.3. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the 'reset_form' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary site options via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
